summary: Bored  of your old standard bows? Tired of the Daedric look? Go old-school with the magic infused Wooden Bow! Or use that old Woodcutter\'s Axe of you at full power! Hunters shall be powerful again!
descriptionHtml:
Name: Hunters Tools
Version: 0.2

------------------------------------------
Description:
I am playing a hunter myself, and my armor is the Warchief Armor from the Immersive Armor mod (really great mod guys, check it out) and the bow with the highest damage, the Daedric bow just didn\'t suit that. So I decided to edit some weapons so I can use them later End-Game. The weapons are all close to Daedric but just a slightly but less powerful. Note that these items can be crafted and bought very early in the game but have some self-control and use them later, if you want a balanced game atleast.

Few tips to (role-)play Hunter by the way:

As race you can choose Khajit or you can become a Vampire for Night Eye/Vampire\'s Sight, allowing you to hunt much better in the dark.

For skills pick either Light or Heavy Armor, depending on your combat-style which will be Archery or One-Handed + Block

So for skills, go with Archery and/or One-Handed + Block, use weapons that fit hunter (Hide, Wooden, Iron).

And if you want to make it easier to find your prey, go use alteration for the Detect Life spell (Might add a Hunter Version so you aren\'t forced to train in Alteration)


------------------------------------------
To-Do/Upcoming:
- Bear Traps
- Hunters Ally: Weapon Enchantment, any non-undead/non-dremora/non-automaton will fight on your side for <dur> seconds, will only have few charges per Grand Soul Gem to keep it from being super-overpowered.

------------------------------------------
Items:

Weapons - Direct Melee:

Huntsman\'s Axe:
A Axe using the template of Woodcutter\'s Axe, swings at normal speed for an axe and has a base damage of 14. It can be crafted under Steel.

_______________________________
Weapons: Distance Melee:

Infused Lightning Bow:
Electrocute your enemies!

10% Faster drawing speed than other bows.
Damages your opponents health and magicka.
Base Damage: 18

Infused Frost Bow:
Give them a nice cold ;)

10% Slower drawing speed than other bows (Frost slows down eh).
Damages your opponents health and stamina. 
Base Damage: 20

Infused Fire Bow:
Heat them up!

Same drawing speed.
Damages only health.
Base Damage: 18

Dimension Transfer Bow:
Wait what Dimension are you from?
Summons an [b]Unbound[/b] Dremora, bewary, this attacks you! This is actually just for fun or if you want to have a training dummy, but he is pretty strong.
Base Damage: 18
Same drawing speed.

_______________________________

Armor:

Huntsman\'s Shield:

Hide Shield, Base Block Rating/Armor of 38, can be crafted under Hide.

NOTE: Every arrow has to hit a NPC Target to make the effect happen, EVEN the summoning ones.

------------------------------------------
Location:
Buy them from the Riverwood Trader.

------------------------------------------
Bugs/Incompatible:
I\'m not aware of any bugs, though I still need to work on it a lot more, please post any!
------------------------------------------
Extra:
If you use the console you might find the following weapons:
Sniper Bow (Extremely long range and precise, high damage but takes 10 times as long too load)
Volley Bow (Shoots 100 arrows at once at the cost of 1, but only the first one actually gets there, the others drop down almost immediately)
Swift Bow (Simple weak bow that shoots quickly)

Also the reason you see no quiver is because I have a no quiver mod and I\'m too lazy to uninstall it.
author: Epixors
